title: Apple rolls out firmware update for Beats Fit Pro, here’s how to check for it
content:
Apple is rolling out a new firmware version for Beats Fit Pro today. The update pushes Beats’ truly wireless earbuds to version 4E64. Head below for details on how to update and how to check your firmware version.

more…

The post Apple rolls out firmware update for Beats Fit Pro, here’s how to check for it appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is rolling out a new firmware version for Beats Fit Pro today. The update pushes Beats' truly wireless earbuds to version 4E64.
